author: zepprebel
body:
Hello,

As you probably know or not, Telegram app are blocked on the territory of the Russian Federation, it would be great to add support for **socks5** to **invoke-webrequest**, this will greatly help Russian users)

P. S sorry for my bad english/ from Russian with love)

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: PowerShell Core is based on .Net Core API HttpClient. Please vote there https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/issues/9768

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as external and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been be closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: invoke-webrequest support socks5
